cause.description:
Unity is so important these days, the world is divided over petty and stupid matters, we should stop supporting different sides of these struggles. We should instead be the supports not of the platforms but of the bridge inbetween these platforms. Unity is the only way we can move forward in this world.
1. Unity is the only way to move forward
2. You can make a difference
3. Try to resolve problems and understand
cause.mission: Bringing people together and spreading unity.
cause.name: Unity
